member.name: IAccServerDocMgr.NewDocument

summary.para: Server applications call the IAccServerDocMgr.NewDocument method when it is available. The adapter creates a wrapped document and registers it with the store, so clients can access information about the text in the document.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: IID of the document. This is usually IID_ITextStoreAnchor.
[in, iid_is(riid)] An interface pointer to the document.

member.name: IAccServerDocMgr.OnDocumentFocus

summary.para: Applications that use Text Services Framework call IAccServerDocMgr.OnDocumentFocus to notify the Microsoft Active Accessibility run time when a document gets or loses focus. The store keeps this information so that clients can access the document that has focus.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: An interface pointer to the document getting focus.

member.name: IAccServerDocMgr.RevokeDocument

summary.para: Server applications call the IAccServerDocMgr.RevokeDocument method to notify the Microsoft Active Accessibility run time that a document is no longer available. Calling RevokeDocument removes it from the store so that clients cannot see the document.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: An interface pointer to the document being revoked.
